text: Hontoni ten to ji no sozo, chuya no kotai, hito o ekisuru mono o hakonde unabara o yuku fune no naka ni, mata arra ga ten kara fura sete shinda daichi o yomigaera se, ikitoshiikerumono o chijo ni hiroku chiraba seru ame no naka ni, mata kazamuki no henkan, hate wa tenchi no maniatte hoshi suru kumo no naka ni, rikai aru mono e no (arra no) shirushi ga aru
